ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Experience Gaining (was Treasure changes in Frontier Mountains)
ygData.msgSnippet: I was running around in Lake of Ill Omen at one of the undead areas.  In a matter of around 4 hours I had managed to gain almost 3 full bubbles of xp which was
ygData.messageBody:
I was running around in Lake of Ill Omen at one of the undead areas. In a
matter of around 4 hours I had managed to gain almost 3 full bubbles of xp
which was enough to get me into level 25. This was with a group of a Necro,
a shaman, 2 druids and 2 bards. The shaman and one of the druids seemed to
know nothing about healing and the shaman eventually left. So now I have
just a tad over 3 bubbles until Fear!!

Katawyn 25th lvl Wood Elf Bard
The Arcane Order - Mithaniel Marr Server


My guild mates who are a tad higher level than me (45-48) prefer to hunt
Hornets in Burning Wood - but I seem to attract them like flies on
(you-know-what) and seem to die at least once every attempt - so I leave
them to that while I get "Pick-up" Groups (in quotes because it's become
pretty regularly who I've been grouping with) at the North Wall...
